projects.name: Investing.com
projects.description: A global company database that utilizes a bunch of technologies like Node.js, Express.js, Handlebars. The user has the ability to view, modify, create, and delete (CRUD)companies listed in the database. Implemented features like - Pagination, 404 Page, Routing, etc

projects.name: COVID-19 Tracker
projects.description: Corona Virus is, unfortunately, spreading through the entire world. What can we, as developers, do to make the situation better? We can help to spread awareness by visualizing the data. The data is fetched from the API and cards displaying the statistics as well as Charts. This project/application is created using modern JavaScript syntax. I also use - Material UI, Charts.js, React Hooks, API data fetching, all of it in React JS!

projects.name: Chillhop Music Scrapper
projects.description: A chillhop.com music scrapper build using Node.js. This tool scrapes music tracks off of chillhop.com and stores it in a local json file.
